Posts.Content: Dec 5, 2008 06:41AM alima wrote: I am 68 years old - had spleen out 6 years ago during surgery for pancreatic tumor (benign); get the triple immunizations every 5 years (pneumo, HIB, meningococcus). Had double mastectomy and implants one month ago and just started chemo - onc will keep close watch for infections - need to be very vigilant.
Posts.Title: Anyone else without a spleem before BC? TorchSong TorchSong
